duties_responsibilities.duty: Plan, execute, and manage the migration and deployment of ETL objects and associated files through CICD pipelines.
Provide L1, L1.5, L2, and L3 support from the Customer Secured Delivery Center setup, and ensure continuous platform optimizations for resiliency, uptime, and vulnerability resolution within SLA.
Enforce platform governance and standards, and provide support for Talend Major, Minor, and Ad hoc releases, as well as annual Disaster Recovery and Password rotation exercises.
Assist with audit requests, platform health reporting, and implementation of continuous improvement and automation opportunities.
Manage and support the platforms on a rotational shift basis, and learn new platform management technologies and tools as part of the cross-skilling exercise in the project life cycle.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field (Master's preferred)
